casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Harper, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Harper (1995), 74 Ohio St.3d 2.]

(No. 95-1054 Submitted September 12, 1995 Decided October 18, 1995.) William T. Goslee, Chief City Prosecutor, for appellant. David R. Evans, for appellee.

*3The discretionary appeal is allowed.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. French (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 446, 650 N.E.2d 887.

Moyer, C.J., F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Douglas, Wright and Resnick, JJ., dissent.
